<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/security/audit/mappers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the mappers for the audit trail types.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"productType","in":"query","description":"The type of product related to the audit trail.","schema":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["Documents","Login","Settings","Contacts"],"type":"string","description":"[Documents - Documents, Login - Login, Settings - Settings, Contacts - Contacts]","example":"Documents"},{"enum":[2,3,7,8],"type":"integer","description":"[2 - Documents, 3 - Login, 7 - Settings, 8 - Contacts]","example":2,"x-enum-varnames":["Documents","Login","Settings","Contacts"],"x-enum-descriptions":["Documents","Login","Settings","Contacts"]}],"x-enum-type":"integer","title":"ProductType"}},{"name":"moduleType","in":"query","description":"The location associated with the audit trail.","schema":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["None","Files","Folders","DocumentsSettings","Rooms","Settings","Contacts","Agents"],"type":"string","description":"[None - None, Files - Files, Folders - Folders, DocumentsSettings - Documents settings, Rooms - Rooms, Settings - Settings, Contacts - Contacts, Agents - Agents]","example":"None"},{"enum":[0,1,2,3,27,29,30,31],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - None, 1 - Files, 2 - Folders, 3 - Documents settings, 27 - Rooms, 29 - Settings, 30 - Contacts, 31 - Agents]","example":0,"x-enum-varnames":["None","Files","Folders","DocumentsSettings","Rooms","Settings","Contacts","Agents"],"x-enum-descriptions":["None","Files","Folders","Documents settings","Rooms","Settings","Contacts","Agents"]}],"x-enum-type":"integer","title":"LocationType"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
